channel.title: 2 Backgrounds?
channel.description:
So i am creating my own client and when i change the background of the client it is still showing an overlay of the regular rs2 login page over my custom login page.
What do i do to make it so that the client only shows my login screen background instead of both?
BTW i am using Menno's Client Base.
Thanks
